channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: New episodes from podcasts I subscribe to on my phone with PocketCasts, on the web. Lots of standards at work here, organized by FeedLand.
item.source:markdown: New episodes from podcasts I subscribe to on my phone with PocketCasts, on the web. Lots of standards at work here, organized by FeedLand.

item.description: The most powerful political statement I've ever heard, from Michelle Obama last night.
item.source:markdown: The most powerful political statement I've ever heard, from Michelle Obama last night.

item.description: The best thing I've read about how the journo-class needs to get back to their job of reporting what happened instead of trying to stage-manage events.
item.source:markdown: The best thing I've read about how the journo-class needs to get back to their job of reporting what happened instead of trying to stage-manage events.

item.description: “We don’t get to change the rules so we always win,” she continued. “If we see a mountain in front of us, we don’t expect there to be an escalator waiting to take us to the top. We put our heads down. We get to work.”
item.source:markdown: “We don’t get to change the rules so we always win,” she continued. “If we see a mountain in front of us, we don’t expect there to be an escalator waiting to take us to the top. We put our heads down. We get to work.”

item.description: "Think about a second Trump administration beginning from the images of Jan. 6, 2021. That is where Trump left us and that is where he would begin."
item.source:markdown: "Think about a second Trump administration beginning from the images of Jan. 6, 2021\. That is where Trump left us and that is where he would begin."

item.description: Podcast: ChatGPT slows down my programming, and that's good.
item.source:markdown: Podcast: ChatGPT slows down my programming, and that's good.

item.description: "You stopped feeding the troll. And science has proven over and over if you do that, the troll will go away."
item.source:markdown: "You stopped feeding the troll. And science has proven over and over if you do that, the troll will go away."

item.description: "The new Democratic Party must not make the mistake Biden made, it must not subjugate itself to the press. When they attack, you must respond."
item.source:markdown: "The new Democratic Party must not make the mistake Biden made, it must not subjugate itself to the press. When they attack, you must respond."

item.description: The NYT is now publishing fiction presented as “news.” They must think we’re idiots.
item.source:markdown: The NYT is now publishing fiction presented as “news.” They must think we’re idiots.

item.description: For no particular reason I'm thinking of Jon Postel this morning. He held up the internet for its earliest years, and died way the fuck too young. People should know who he was and what he did for us.
item.source:markdown: For no particular reason I'm thinking of Jon Postel this morning. He held up the internet for its earliest years, and died way the fuck too young. People should know who he was and what he did for us.
